name: Introduction to Ethics
description: This course provides an introduction to ethical theory and its application to practical issues.

name: Moral Psychology and Rationality
description: This course introduces the study of moral psychology, focusing on the role of rationality in moral decision-making.

name: Theories of Moral Responsibility
description: This course examines the philosophical theories of moral responsibility, including the concept of free will.

name: Ethics and the Law
description: This course explores the relationship between ethics and law, focusing on the ethical implications of legal decision-making.

name: Moral Philosophy
description: This course covers a wide range of topics in moral philosophy, including moral theories, moral dilemmas, and moral responsibility.
